properties.description: Analyze data present in spark table

content.query:
SELECT TOP (100) [c_customer_sk]
,[c_customer_id]
,[c_current_cdemo_sk]
,[c_current_hdemo_sk]
,[c_current_addr_sk]
,[c_first_shipto_date_sk]
,[c_first_sales_date_sk]
,[c_salutation]
,[c_first_name]
,[c_last_name]
,[c_preferred_cust_flag]
,[c_birth_day]
,[c_birth_month]
,[c_birth_year]
,[c_birth_country]
,[c_login]
,[c_email_address]
,[c_last_review_date]
 FROM [default].[dbo].[customer_spp]

 select COUNT(*) from [default].[dbo].[customer_spp]
